HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: <size=16>Hotfix</size>|Fixed bug with colonists and visitors not eating their food in inventory\nVisitors won't steal your food anymore !|Can now make visitors use their vanilla behavior in settings.|Fixed insects affected by a food policy and trying to fetch other foods than their jelly.|Added scheduled food search cache clearing. This might improve performances a bit.

Hotfix| UI Change| * New inspect tab. UI is no more shown inside the needs tab.| Bugs fixes| * Error messages (yellow) after selling stuff to traders.| * Pets still hunting prisoners (oops). * Pets will not hunt humans at all anymore (even hostile ones).
Updated to A17| Minor changes| * Forcing paste dispense will now show a message if available energy is insufficient.
